meanings.definition: In a way that causes nausea or disgust.
meanings.sent1: The smell of rotten eggs made me feel nauseously.
meanings.sent2: The spoiled milk tasted nauseously sour.
meanings.sent3: The sight of the messy room made me feel nauseously.
meanings.sent4: The horror movie was so scary, it left me feeling nauseously.
meanings.sent5: The roller coaster ride made my stomach churn nauseously.

meanings.definition: In a manner that is sickening or revolting.
meanings.sent1: The slimy texture of the food made me feel nauseously.
meanings.sent2: The gruesome scene in the movie was nauseously disturbing.
meanings.sent3: The clown's performance was so bad, it made me feel nauseously.
meanings.sent4: The news of the crime left a nauseously feeling in the air.
meanings.sent5: The taste of the medicine was nauseously bitter.
